name: Douglas Carl Engelbart ("Doug")
ethnicity: German (father's side), Norwegian and Swedish (mother's side)
known_for: Computer mouse, Hypertext, Groupware, Interactive computing
prizes: National Medal of Technology, Lemelson-MIT Prize, Turing Award, Lovelace Medal, Norbert Wiener Award for Social and Professional Responsibility, http://www.computerhistory.org/fellowawards/index.php?id
